parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.54

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Compares types of all elements of input array to types of all elements of template array. Similar to [[isEqualTypeArray]] however this command is designed for fast validation of functions params, so there are differences:
* Input can be anything but will be expected to be an [[Array]], otherwise [[false]] is returned
* Input array can be longer but not shorter than template array, will return [[false]] if shorter
* [[nil]] could be used in template type array as a wild card to allow any type match

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> input '''isEqualTypeParams''' template

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> input: [[Anything]] - could be value of any type, but only type [[Array]] will be validated

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> template: [[Array]] - array of expected types

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>These all return [[true]]</value></part></template>
[1,2,[[player]],"10"] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""];
[1,2,[[player]],"10",[[true]]] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[nil]],""];
[1,2,[[getPos]] [[player]],"10",[[true]]] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[nil]],""];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>These all return [[false]]</value></part></template>
123 [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""];
[] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""];
[1,2,[[player]]] [[isEqualTypeParams]] [0,0,[[objNull]],""];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isEqualTypeAll]], [[isEqualTypeAny]], [[isEqualType]], [[isEqualTypeArray]], [[param]], [[params]], [[isEqualTo]], [[typeName]]
</value></part></template></root>
